title: #430 Stav Cums On My Tits and Pours Cum Down My Throat: A Relationship Advice Episode with Stavros Halkias
itunes:title: Stav Cums On My Tits and Pours Cum Down My Throat - A Relationship Podcast with Stavros Halkias
description:
Host of the Cumtown podcast Stavros Halkias joins standup comedian Ari Shaffir for a relationship and sex advice episode of Skeptic Tank. This is a “Dear Ari” relationship advice episode that’s usually available on Patreon only but in honor of Juneteenth, we’re making this one available to the public.

Standup comedian Stavros Halkias and former friend of Bert Kreischer’s wife Ari Shaffir answer Patron submitted questions about wild sex, lame friends, and partners who pork out. This is the most important thing to happen to the country since Joe Biden reverse rammed Donald Trump and the drippings got imported by a viral lab on Wuhan and the rest was history.

Please sign up for Ari’s Patreon for more fun content like this and to keep hot loads all over his chest. https://www.patreon.com/arishaffir

SUPPORT STAV! For Stav’s upcoming tour: https://stavvy.biz/pages/tour-dates

Check out 'Stavvy Solves Your Problems' & more: https://bit.ly/3gIsNrB

Watch Pod Don't Lie with Sam & Stav: https://www.drpshp.co/pod-dont-lie

 

The Music:

Dolly Parton - I Will Always Love You

I’m gonna cum on your tits - Beaver Shoot

Righteous Brothers - Unchained Melody

Boyz 2 Men - I’ll Make Love To You

Thank you to our sponsor! Go to 3chi.com and use promo code "Skeptic" for 5% off Delta 8 products!
